Initialized(uint8).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to deposit

params._erc20: The address of the ERC20 contract
params._xerc20: The address of the XERC20 contract

multicall(bytes[]).details: Receives and executes a batch of function calls on this contract.

params._amount: The amount of tokens to withdraw

IXERC20Lockbox_Native().notice: Reverts when a user tries to deposit non-native tokens on a native lockbox

IXERC20Lockbox_NotNative().notice: Reverts when a user tries to deposit native tokens on a non-native lockbox

IXERC20Lockbox_WithdrawFailed().notice: Reverts when a user tries to withdraw and the call fails

Deposit(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when tokens are deposited into the lockbox

Withdraw(address,uint256).notice: Emitted when tokens are withdrawn from the lockbox

ERC20().notice: The ERC20 token of this contract

IS_NATIVE().notice: Whether the ERC20 token is the native gas token of this chain

XERC20().notice: The XERC20 token of this contract

deposit().notice: Deposit native tokens into the lockbox

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit ERC20 tokens into the lockbox

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw ERC20 tokens from the lockbox
